name.baseName: Fermented fruit and vegetable juice ; Fruit and vegetable juice concentrate ; Fermentation ; All sizes; NESPS2
发酵果蔬汁 ; 浓缩果蔬汁 ; 发酵 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所提供的过程数据涉及到所有规模生产的发酵果蔬汁和浓缩果蔬汁的生产。该过程还包括旨在处理生产过程中产生的废水污染的尾气管理技术。用于处理各种污染物（颗粒物、化学需氧量（COD）、氨氮、有机结合氮和总磷）的技术包括物理化学处理、厌氧生物处理、好氧生物处理和物理处理的组合，报告了每种污染物类型的不同效率。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码1523文件，在完整版文件中第2662页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物理化学处理法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法+物理处理法，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施耗电量（千瓦时）/设备额定功率（千瓦）/设备运行时间(小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
nan
源文件中描述为为发酵果蔬汁，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of dust removal facilities (hours) / annual operating time of hot blast stove (hours)
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = normal operating time of wastewater treatment equipment (hours/year) / normal production time (hours/year)
